message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product worth $1,000,000 at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discount, I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $850,000. This is a fair price given the value you mentioned and allows me to stay within my budget. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still ensuring a fair deal, I am proposing to sell the product to you for $900,000. This offer reflects a reasonable compromise, allowing you to secure this high-value product at a price that is beneficial for both parties.
